com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html

Class OAHTMLEditorKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.EditorKit
      • javax.swing.text.DefaultEditorKit
        • javax.swing.text.StyledEditorKit
          • javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit
            • com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.OAHTMLEditorKit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public abstract class OAHTMLEditorKit
extends javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit
    EditorKit for OAHTMLTextPane
    • Document - OAHTMLDocument
    • Writing - OAHTMLWriter
    • Custom Views - ViewFactory
    • Custom Actions
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
